text: Manasam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by CS Sudheesh and starring Dileep and Srividya in the lead roles. ==Cast== *Srividya as Rajalakshmi *Dileep as Solomon *Kaveri *Jagathy Sreekumar *Biju Menon *Nedumudi Venu * MS Thrippoonithura *Ponnamma Babu * Priyanka *Risabava ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Manasam
